description: Bamboo skewers are a prime vessel for snackable summertime treats. Combine fresh seafood with premier cured meats for a tasty bite.
keywords: Chorizo & Prawn Skewers With Lemon Aioli
name: Chorizo & Prawn Skewers With Lemon Aioli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk mayonnaise, garlic and half of the lemon zest in a small bowl. Season prawns and sprinkle with basil and remaining zest. Serve with lemon aioli.
